Title: Keys to Recovering from Business Failures
Description:
Today we’ll hear about:

•       A business partnership that resulted in a mountain of legal and financial issues

•       How a homeless veteran turned successful business owner wants to be more generous

•       Why every entrepreneur has to fire themselves

•       Dave’s philosophy behind quitting and why he doesn’t believe that “winners never quit”
